documentation.text:
DiceRoller - Simplified for Monad Switchboard On-Demand
 
 Since Monad's Switchboard uses pull-based model (not callback),
 we use a hybrid approach:
 1. Contract emits request event
 2. Backend fetches randomness from Switchboard API
 3. Backend submits to this contract
 4. Contract validates and emits result

@notice Request a dice roll (emits event for backend to process)
 @param roundId Unique identifier for this roll
@notice Get dice result for a round

6"}],"name":"requestDiceRoll","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"roundId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"randomness","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"submitVerifiedRoll","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"requestDiceRoll(uint256)":{"params":{"roundId":"Unique identifier for this roll"}},"submitVerifiedRoll(uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"randomness":"The verified random bytes32","roundId":"The round ID"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getDiceResult(uint256)":{"notice":"Get dice result for a round"},"requestDiceRoll(uint256)":{"notice":"Request a dice roll (emits event for backend to process)"},"submitVerifiedRoll(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Submit verified randomness (called by backend after Switchboard verification)"}},"notice":"DiceRoller - Simplified for Monad Switchboard On-Demand  Since Monad's Switchboard uses pull-based model (not callback), we use a hybrid approach: 1. Contract emits request event 2. Backend fetches randomness from Switchboard API 3. Backend submits to this contract 4. Contract validates and emits result","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/DiceRoller.sol":"DiceRoller"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/DiceRoller.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9dfa0050567c27b79b8b7fd80d9eb147fc91e4801ef9a0807132eb0c4f22d7bd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4b35d8c43d4410277477cbc791ae9d56dcdf74e3e01aefab161afec42e163cbe","dweb:/ipfs/QmPpbGYfBwwo34pSScFy98zEurhLEsouhHVzDwBUHt7RB9"]}},"version":1}
